words.source: H559 (אָמַר, 'to say'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'said', ESV 'said', NASB 'said' — all agree
Preposition lamed + suffix 3fs, HR/Sp3fs; KJV 'unto her', ESV 'to her', NASB 'to her' — all agree
H1323 (בַּת, 'daughter'), HNcfsc (noun-common-feminine-singular-construct); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'Pharaoh's daughter'
H3212 (הָלַךְ, 'to go'), HVhv2fs (Hiphil-imperative-2fs, causative = 'cause to go/take away'); KJV 'Take', ESV 'Take', NASB 'Take' — all agree
H3206 (יֶלֶד, 'child/boy'), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV 'this child', ESV 'this child', NASB 'this child' — all agree
H3243 (יָנַק, 'to suck/nurse'), HC/Vhv2fs/Sp3ms (conjunctive/Hiphil-imperative-2fs/suffix-3ms); KJV 'nurse it', ESV 'nurse him', NASB 'nurse him' — all agree
Preposition lamed + suffix 1cs, HR/Sp1cs; KJV 'for me', ESV 'for me', NASB 'for me' — all agree
H589 (אֲנִי, 'I'), HC/Pp1cs (conjunctive/pronoun-personal-1cs); KJV 'I', ESV 'I', NASB 'I' — all agree
H5414 (נָתַן, 'to give'), HVqi1cs (Qal-imperfect-1cs); KJV 'will give', ESV 'will give', NASB 'will give' — all agree
H7939 (שָׂכָר, 'wages/reward'), HNcmsc/Sp2fs (noun-common-masculine-singular-construct/suffix-2fs); KJV 'thee thy wages', ESV 'you your wages', NASB 'you your wages' — all agree
H3947 (לָקַח, 'to take'), HC/Vqw3fs (conjunctive/Qal-wayyiqtol-3fs); KJV 'the woman took', ESV 'the woman took', NASB 'the woman took' — all agree
H802 (אִשָּׁה, 'woman/wife'), HTd/Ncfsa (article/noun-common-feminine-singular-absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the woman'
H3206 (יֶלֶד, 'child/boy'), HTd/Ncmsa (article/noun-common-masculine-singular-absolute); KJV/ESV/NASB all render 'the child'
H5134 (נוּק, 'to nurse/suckle'), HC/Vhw3fs/Sp3ms (conjunctive/Hiphil-wayyiqtol-3fs/suffix-3ms); KJV 'nursed it', ESV 'nursed him', NASB 'nursed him' — all agree
